frame.name: Addiction
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame concerns an <fen>Addict</fen>'s physiological or psychological compulsive dependence on an <fen>Addictant</fen>, the substance or behavior to which the <fen>Addict</fen> is addicted. <ex></ex> <ex>Although she was never a big fan of drugs, <fex name="Addict">she</fex> <m>became</m> <t>hooked</t> <fex name="Addictant">on that designer drug</fex> instantly.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Addict">He</fex> <m>is</m> a <fex name="Addictant">cocaine</fex> <t>addict</t>.</ex>
<ex>There are some <fex name="Addictant">cocaine</fex> <t><fex name="Addict">addicts</fex></t> living in the house across the street.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Addict
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Addict</fen> is physiologically or psychologically dependent on a substance or a behavior.</def-root>

FE.name: Addictant
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Addictant</fen> is the substance or behavior to which the <fen>Addict</fen> is dependent.<ex>Pat defeated <fex name="Addict">her</fex> <fex name="Addictant">heroin</fex> <t>addiction</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which an <fen>Addict</fen> is addicted to the <fen>Addictant</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Compeller
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Compeller</fen> is the part of a human's body or psyche that compels the <fen>Addict</fen> to seek out the <fen>Addictant</fen>. <ex><fex name="Addict">Pat</fex> <m name="Supp">is</m> <fex name="Compeller">emotionally</fex> <t>addicted</t> <fex name="Addictant">to Kim</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Addict">Cyril</fex> <m name="Supp">is</m> <fex name="Compeller">physically</fex> <t>addicted</t> <fex name="Addictant">to nicotine</fex>.</ex> </def-root>
